data.name: SHiRO 011
data.detailed_description:
Join action-filled battles and experience a shooter like never before. Compete in multiplayer battles - online or local with your friends! SHiRO 011 supports Online Battles, LAN-Partys and has a Splitscreen mode up to 4 players. Read bellow why this shooter isn't anything you know!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES


MADE FOR COMPETITION
  • SHiRO 011 is aiming for eSports and will grow together with it´s community.
  • Everyone enters the arena with the same weapons, abilities and lifepoints.
  • Play for yourself in "Free for all" or enter the arena as a team. Up to 4 teams can compete against each other at the same time.

ONE SHOT MECHANIC


  • Every hit is deadly, no matter where you hit your opponent. Perfect timing is everything.

ALWAYS IN ACTION

  • Every player respawns with a protection that lasts 2,5 seconds. You are immortal and immun against timespheres for this period of time. Furthermore your movement speed increases to 200%. Use this time to jump back into action and bring yourself in the right position before loosing your protection.

  • There is no auto reload in this game. Reload whenever you think that the time is right for reloading. It will slow you down but not restrict your movement. You can still jump and use the bullet time while reloading. This gives you still the chance to dodge bulletstorms.

MULTIPLAYER WITH BULLET TIME


  • Create a timesphere around you and slow down everything within the sphere.
  • This can be used to dodge bulletstorms or to hunt your enemies down.

GAME MODES


Four game modes will be available at day one of Early Access. There is still much more to come and we want to try completely new game modes with the community.


LAST ONE STANDING:
  • Every player enters the arena with 10 Lifepoints. Last one standing wins.
    Once you lost all your lifepoints, you will take control over the spectator bot

ODDBALL:
  • Chase the ball and try to hold it as long as you can. Each second brings you closer to victory.

GOLDEN SHOT:
  • You have to reload after every shot except you hit someone. Then you will get another shot available without reloading.
  • Bullettime and Grenades are available.

ONE FOR ALL:
  • Two teams compete against each other but only two players will enter the arena at the same time.
  • Every Round will be a 1v1 with only one lifepoint. Last team standing wins. And try not to be nervous, it´s just the whole team watching you ;)

data.short_description: Have you ever played a 3rd-Person Arena Shooter?Join action-filled battles and experience a shooter like never before. Compete in multiplayer battles - online or local with your friends! SHiRO 011 supports Online Battles, LAN-Partys and has a Splitscreen mode up to 4 players.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Czech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64/32 Bit
  • Processor: 4 Cores
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: RAM: 4 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64/32 Bit
  • Processor: i7
  • Graphics: GTX 960

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
